elements.name: As a Po Curator, I can add an organization name alias

steps.name: I know the name of the alias I wish to add for an organization
I am logged in to CTRP PO application
I have searched for an organization and found the one I wish to edit
I have selected the function Edit Organization
I have selected the function Add Alias
I am on the Add Alias information screen
I enter the alias name of the organization I wish to add for the selected organization
the system should add the alias name to the list of alias names for the selected organization
